errors.cloudNotAvailableGuest: Cloud features are not available. Please continue as guest.
errors.connectionTimeout: Connection to server failed. Please check your internet connection and try again.
errors.sessionCreateFailed: Session could not be created. Please try again.
errors.accountNotFound: No account found with this email.
errors.magicLinkFailed: Magic link could not be sent.
errors.linkExpired: The link has expired. Please request a new one.
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters.
errors.passwordResetFailed: Password reset could not be sent.
errors.passwordSameAsOld: The new password must be different from the old one.
errors.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address.
errors.nameTooShort: Name must be at least 2 characters.
errors.sessionTimeout: Session creation took too long. Please try again.
errors.authTimeoutMessage: Authentication could not be completed. Please try again.

login.title: Sign In
login.subtitlePassword: Sign in with email and password.
login.subtitleMagicLink: We'll send you a magic link via email.

register.title: Register
register.subtitle: Create an account to manage tournaments.
register.subtitleGuest: Create an account to sync your tournaments.
register.name: Name
register.registrationCodeHint: You'll get the code from the tournament organizer.
register.legal: By registering, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

resetPassword.title: Email Sent!
resetPassword.message: We've sent a password reset link to {{email}}. Click the link in the email to set a new password.

magicLink.title: Magic Link Sent!
magicLink.message: We've sent a login link to {{email}}. Click the link in the email to sign in.

emailConfirmation.title: Confirm Your Email
emailConfirmation.message: We've sent a confirmation email to {{email}}. Please click the link in the email to activate your account.
emailConfirmation.migrated_one: {{count}} tournament will be synced after activation.
emailConfirmation.migrated_other: {{count}} tournaments will be synced after activation.

setPassword.title: Set New Password
setPassword.subtitle: Enter your new password.
setPassword.sessionExpiredMessage: Your session has expired. Please request a new password reset link.

success.title: Password Changed!
success.message: Your new password has been saved successfully.

description.limitReached: You've reached the limit of {{limit}} tournaments. Register for free to get unlimited tournaments.
description.nearLimit: As a guest, you can create up to {{limit}} tournaments ({{used}}/{{limit}} used). Register for unlimited tournaments.
description.default: Create an account to save and sync your tournaments.

mergeDialog.title: Account Already Exists
mergeDialog.message: The email address {{email}} is already linked to an account.
mergeDialog.submessage: Would you like to merge your current tournaments with this existing account? Your data will not be lost.

merging.title: Merging accounts...
merging.message: Your tournaments are being transferred. Please wait a moment.

success.title: Successfully Merged!
success.fallback: Your accounts have been successfully merged.

tournamentLimit.title: Tournament Limit Reached
tournamentLimit.message: You've reached the limit of {{limit}} tournaments for guest accounts ({{used}}/{{total}} used).
tournamentLimit.submessage: Create a free account to manage unlimited tournaments and securely store your data in the cloud.
tournamentLimit.hint: Your existing tournaments will be automatically transferred.
